pages.title: Celestial Infusion
pages.text: A simple, single-brazier transmutation. Place a Ritual Brazier with a nearby Celestial Bloom, insert the ingredient, then activate with a $(l:hexalia:content/tools#hex_focus)Hex Focus$(/l).

pages.title: Ritual Brazier
pages.text: Core station for infusions. Insert one item, then use a $(l:hexalia:content/tools#hex_focus)Hex Focus$(/l) to start. The brazier is not consumed. You can create one by sneaking with an $(l:hexalia:content/tools#athame)Athame$(/l) on planks.

pages.title: Celestial Bloom
pages.text: Must be planted within 3 blocks of the brazier. Consumed during infusion (turns into a Dead Bush). For acquisition, see $(l:hexalia:resources/herbs#celestial_bloom)Celestial Bloom$(/l).

pages.title: Setup
pages.text: $(li)1 $(l:hexalia:core_mechanics/celestial_infusion#brazier)Ritual Brazier$(/l).$(br)$(li)≥1 $(l:hexalia:core_mechanics/celestial_infusion#bloom)Celestial Bloom$(/l) planted within 3 blocks.$(br)$(li)A valid infusion ingredient.

pages.title: How To
pages.text: $(li)Place the brazier.$(br)$(li)Plant a Celestial Bloom within 3 blocks.$(br)$(li)Right-click the brazier with the ingredient to load it.$(br)$(li)Right-click the brazier with a $(l:hexalia:content/tools#hex_focus)Hex Focus$(/l) to infuse.

pages.title: What Happens
pages.text: $(li)Nearby blooms are checked automatically.$(br)$(li)The input item is consumed; the result appears near the brazier and nudges outward.$(br)$(li)The Celestial Bloom is consumed and becomes a Dead Bush.

pages.title: Tips
pages.text: $(li)Bring spare blooms—each infusion consumes one. Duplicate them faster by planting on $(l:hexalia:content/functional_blocks#infused_dirt)Infused Dirt$(/l).$(br)$(li)Braziers are reusable—set up a permanent infusion corner.
